DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate flexible doses (5-30mg) of aripiprazole versus placebo in patients with bipolar depression.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Aripiprazole in Patients With Bipolar I Disorder With a Major Depression Episode
DOC.criteria: ages 1865 Men and women, who have experienced a prior manic episode that required hospitalization, and now meet criteria for a major depressive episode.
